metadata.title: CVE-2024-44070 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting (FRR) through 10.1. bgp_attr_encap inbgpd/bgp_attr.c does not check the actual remaining stream length beforetaking the TLV value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 10.0.1-0.1ubuntu2
frr-pythontools - 10.0.1-0.1ubuntu2
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 10.0.1-0.1ubuntu2
frr-snmp - 10.0.1-0.1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.1-0.1ubuntu2').
